To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Piercing _piercing;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_piercing = Piercing(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_piercing.IsReady)
{
    var period = _piercing.Period.Value;
    var current = _piercing.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.piercing = self.Piercing(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.piercing.IsReady:
    period = self.piercing.Period.Value
    current = self.piercing.Current.Value
